channel.title: Is there a kill command?
channel.description: would anyone happen to know a kill command. i was thinking about putting it on my server and if there is one plz let know ;) thanks a lot, llama man111

item.title: Is there a kill command?
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

} if (cmd[0].equals("kill")) { String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)]; p2.appendHit(99, 0); p2.appendHit(99, 0); p2.appendHit(99, 0); p2.appendHit(99, 0); p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, "HOLY $#@$ YOU GOT MURDERD!"); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, "You ate " +victim+ "."); }

Its ::kill (playername)

item.title: Is there a kill command?
item.dc:creator: @P3rscape P3rscape
item.description:
@P3rscape wrote:

No but there is bomb, very annyoing to!

[code]if (command.startsWith(“bomb”)){
animation(437,absY,absX);
attackPlayersPrayer(15, 2);
}

		if (command.startsWith("heal")){
			animation(436,absY,absX);
		}[/code]

Add this under one of your commands.

Have Fun

Read full topic
